cause.description:
Zero tolerance polices, censorship in schools, student activism, student choice, homeschooling, due process, student privacy, mandatory uniforms and overly strict dress codes, student journalism and publishing, academic freedom... the list goes on. If you care about the way students are treated in schools and want to take a stand in support of student rights, this is the place to do it.
1. Student Rights
cause.mission: Support Student Rights in schools throughout the US.
cause.name: Student Rights
